n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x.sort()
if n % 2 == 0:
    print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
else:
    print(0)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] - x[i-1] > 1:
        ans += x[i] - x[i-1] - 1

print(ans)

import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**6)

def dfs(x, y):
    global ans
    if x == 0 and y == 0:
        ans += 1
        return
    if x > 0:
        dfs(x-1, y)
    if y > 0:
        dfs(x, y-1)
